rules_text:
When Murkwater Voyager enters, surveil 2.
Whenever Murkwater Voyager attacks, you may exile a card from your graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Murkwater Voyager. If a noncreature card is exiled this way, put your choice of a vigilance counter, a reach counter, or a trample counter on Murkwater Voyager.
Crew 2
